## R Markdown

Finds embeddedness of vertices within datasets

```{r}
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)
 

rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

embedFunc<-function(resultFolder,dataset){ 
  
  e<-data.frame(read.csv(paste(resultFolder,dataset,"embeddedness",".txt",sep=""),sep="\t",header=F))
  e<-(round(e,2)) 
  f<-ddply(e,.(V1),summarise,R1=length(V1))
  f$R1<-round(f$R1/nrow(e),3)
  f$R1<-cumsum(f$R1)
  f<-cbind(dataset,f)
  print(paste(dataset,mean(e$V1),median(e$V1)))
  return(f) 
   
}
 

resultFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/embeddedness/"

d<- embedFunc(resultFolder,"Facebook")
d<-rbind(d,embedFunc(resultFolder,"Enron"))
 d<-rbind(d,embedFunc(resultFolder,"Dblp"))
 d<-rbind(d,embedFunc(resultFolder,"Epinions"))
 d<-rbind(d,embedFunc(resultFolder,"Wiki"))
 
m12<- ggplot(d,aes(x=V1,y=(R1),color=dataset))+geom_line(size=1)+scale_x_continuous(name="embeddedness")+theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.6),text = element_text(size=16))+scale_y_sqrt(name="fraction of nodes")
m12<-m12+geom_point(aes(shape=dataset), size=2) +scale_shape_manual(values=c(0,1,2,3,4)) 
m12

 figFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/figs/"
ggsave(filename=paste(figFolder,"embed.eps",sep=""),plot=m12,width=6,height=4,unit="in")

```
